reviewText: The only reason I gave this movie 2 stars is because of Roc Tien. I liked him in 18 bronze men. This movie was so bad, I just didn't get it. A man cuts off somebody's arm in a duel, another man acts like his body guard because he is his best friend and worse enemy(he wants to protect him in order to challenge him) and the man whose arm was cut off, wants to challenge the same guy who cut off his arm because he is the best swordsman in china???? What the......... This is as much as I can describe this.
